name: daunt
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
to make someone feel slightly frightened or worried about their ability to achieve something: She was not at all daunted by the size of the problem. Synonym
discourage (MAKE LESS CONFIDENT)

to make someone feel slightly frightened or worried about his or her ability to achieve something; to discourage: She’s not at all daunted by criticism. daunting adjective us
